title: Ace Ventura: pet detective
creator_credit: Morgan Creek, James G. Robinson and Tom Shadyac
brief_description: There’s hope out there for all distraught pet owners concerned about the disappearance of their pets; Ace Ventura, pet detective, whose leading the small but exclusive field. Ace is contacted by the beautiful Melissa (Courteney Cox), to locate Snowflake, dolphin mascot of the Miami Football team and good luck charm. Ace is not only up against a ruthless kidnapper, but scorn and resistance from the police force who have the utmost contempt for his profession. Cast includes Jim Carrey, Sean Young, Courteney Cox, Tone Loc and Dan Marino (Miami Dolphins).
